name: Sachi House: Ojima Tokyo
subtitle: 3LDK Family House ‚Ä¢ Park Front ‚Ä¢ Direct to Shinjuku
description:
Located in ≈åjima, K≈çt≈ç-ku, Tokyo, perfect for 2‚Äì8 guests. Just around 8 minutes‚Äô walk to ≈åjima Station, one train go straight to Shinjuku (18min by express train and 26min by local train). A large park in front of the house, with swings and slides is right in front ‚Äî great for families. Fully equipped with IH kitchen, 140L fridge, microwave, rice cooker, 32‚Ä≥ smart TV, air conditioner, and dining table.

üè† Clean and Spacious House
„ÉªA fully renovated 3LDK (~60„é°) house exclusively for guest use.
„ÉªAccommodates up to 7 guests with three bedrooms.

üöâ Convenient Location
„ÉªJust a 8-minute walk from Ojima Station on the Toei Shinjuku Line.
„ÉªOnly 2-minute walk to the traditional shopping street (Sun road Nakanohashi)
„ÉªConveniently located near convenience stores, supermarkets, drugstores, and various restaurants.

üõèÔ∏è Comfortable Sleeping Arrangements
„ÉªEach bedroom is furnished with beds and mattress to ensure a relaxing sleep.

„ÄêFamily-Friendly Amenities„Äë
„ÉªBaby chair are available at no extra cost.
„ÉªYoutube connected with TV are provided for entertainment.

üì∂ Unlimited High-Speed Wi-Fi
„ÉªEnjoy free, high-speed Wi-Fi suitable for streaming videos without interruption.

üíª Remote Work Ready
„ÉªEquipped with a dedicated desk, chair for remote work.
„ÉªHigh-speed Wi-Fi is provided for seamless online activities.

üõãÔ∏è Dining & Kitchen
„ÉªDining table with 4 seats and 1 bench and 1 baby high seat.
„ÉªFully equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, rice cooker, and other kitchen appliances.
„ÉªGeneral tableware and cooking utensils are available.
„ÉªA television connected to Youtube and internet.

üõèÔ∏è Bedrooms
„ÉªBedroom 201: Two Semi-double beds, futons, air conditioning, and one electric fan, and working desk/chair
„ÉªBedroom 301: One Semi-double bed, futons, air conditioning and one electric fan.
„ÉªBedroom 302: One double bed, air conditioning, working desk/chair.

üß∫ Laundry Room
„ÉªWashing machine at no extra cost. Dry on balcony or use coin laundry nearby.

üßº Bathroom Facilities
„ÉªWashroom: Independent washbasin with a hairdryer.
„ÉªShower Rooms: located on the 1st floor.
„ÉªFeatures automatic water heaters for easy hot water access.
„ÉªBody soap and shampoo are provided.

üöΩToilets: Located on the 1st floor, equipped with bidet and seat warming functions.

üß¥ Amenities
„ÉªFace towels and bath towels are provided for each guest. Extra set will be charged for 300 JPY. Please contact to the host in advance.
„ÉªBody soap, shampoo, and conditioner are available.
„ÉªLaundry detergent are provided.

üö≠ Smoking Policy
„ÉªSmoking is prohibited indoors, limited outdoors. Thank you very much for your understandings and your cooperation.

üîë Guest Access
Guests have exclusive access to the entire house and all amenities.

üìÑ Additional Information
For non-Japanese guests, passport information is required prior to check-in.

additionalRules:
üîê Security / Guests
„ÉªOnly registered guests are allowed to stay.
„ÉªDo not share the entrance PIN code with non-guests.

üí° Energy & Usage
„ÉªPlease turn off air conditioners, lights, and TV when leaving the room.

üöΩ Bathroom Rules
„ÉªPlease flush toilet paper only.
„ÉªDo not flush wipes or sanitary products.

üóëÔ∏è Waste (n·∫øu form cho ph√©p th√™m 1 d√≤ng)

‚ö†Ô∏è Damages

manual.title: Trash Separation
manual.content:
üóëÔ∏è Burnable Waste (Combustible Trash)
„ÄÄ‚úî Food waste, paper, tissues, plastic bags
„ÄÄ‚ùå No cans, bottles, or glass
„ÄÄ‚û° Put in the Burnable Waste bin

ü•´ Recyclables (Cans & PET Bottles)
„ÄÄ‚úî Aluminum cans, glass bottles, PET bottles

manual.title: Hot Water Panel
manual.content: Press the "Power" button on the wall panel in the kitchen. Set temp to 38¬∞C before using the shower.

manual.title: Air Conditioner
manual.content: Remote is on the wall. "Reibo" is Cooling (Blue), "Danbo" is Heating (Red). Please turn off when leaving.

manual.title: Checkin Process
manual.content:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Open the cover

manual.title: Microwave Usage Guide
manual.content:
1. Start Cooking
- Press Start to begin.
- The screen shows the remaining time.

2. Pause / Stop
- Press Stop/Cancel to stop when needed.

3. Remove Food
- Use oven mitts if the food is hot.

4. Cleaning
- Wipe the inside with a damp cloth after use.

‚ö†Ô∏è Safety Tips
- Do not put metal or aluminum foil inside.
- Be careful when heating liquids.
- Do not block air vents.

üí° Use Tip
- If the microwave doesn‚Äôt start:
  Open and close the door ‚Üí Press Cancel ‚Üí Try again.

manual.title: Rice Cooker Guide
manual.content:
1. Measure Rice
- Use the cup. Wash until water is clear.

2. Add Water
- Fill to the marked level.

3. Choose Mode
- Press Menu („É°„Éã„É•„Éº) and select rice type.

4. Start
- Press Start (ÁÇäÈ£Ø).

5. Finish
- Auto Keep Warm (‰øùÊ∏©).

6. Stop / Reset
- Press Cancel („Å®„Çä„Åë„Åó).

7. Reheat
- Use Reheat (ÂÜçÂä†ÁÜ±) if needed.

‚ö†Ô∏è Tips
- Do not open lid while cooking.
- Be careful of hot steam.

manual.title: Washlet (Toilet) Usage Guide
manual.content:
1. Start
- Press Rear („Åä„Åó„Çä) for rear wash.
- Press Soft („ÇÑ„Çè„Çâ„Åã) for gentle wash.
- Press Bidet („Éì„Éá) for feminine wash.

2. Adjust
- Use + / ‚Äì to change water pressure.
- Use ‚óÄ ‚ñ∂ to adjust nozzle position.
- Set water temperature if needed.

3. Stop
- Press Stop (Ê≠¢) to stop washing.

üí° Tips
- Press Stop if unsure.
- Nozzle cleans automatically.
